P33N.A.description: Perception of immigrants' impact on the economy
P33N.A.question: Do you agree or disagree that immigrants are good for the country’s economy?

P33ST.B.description: Perception of immigrants as job competitors
P33ST.B.question: Do you agree or disagree that immigrants come to compete for jobs?

P33N.C.description: Perception of immigrants and crime rates
P33N.C.question: Do you agree or disagree that immigrants increase crime rates?

P33N.D.question: Do you agree or disagree that immigrants improve our society with new ideas and culture?

P37CSN.A.description: Support for adoption rights for same-sex couples
P37CSN.A.question: Do you agree or disagree that same-sex couples should be allowed to adopt children?

P37CSN.B.question: Do you agree or disagree that marriage between people of the same sex should be allowed?

P37STCS.C.description: Belief that women should stay at home and men should work
P37STCS.C.question: Do you agree or disagree that it is better for women to concentrate on the home and for men to work outside?

P37WVSSTCS.D.description: Belief that men are better political leaders
P37WVSSTCS.D.question: Do you agree or disagree that men are better political leaders than women?

P37STCS.E.description: Belief that a woman earning more than a man causes trouble
P37STCS.E.question: Do you agree or disagree that when a woman earns more than a man, it almost certainly causes problems?

P37CSN.F.description: Support for legal recognition of gender change on ID documents
P37CSN.F.question: Do you agree or disagree that a person’s gender change should be legally recognized on identity documents?

P37WVSCS.G.description: Belief that men should have job priority during scarcity
P37WVSCS.G.question: Do you agree or disagree that when jobs are scarce, men should have more right to a job than women?

P37WVSCS.H.description: Belief that same-sex couples are equally good parents
P37WVSCS.H.question: Do you agree or disagree that homosexual couples are just as good parents as heterosexual couples?
